version_description:
The Uphold app allows you to add and withdraw funds directly from your iOS device using all the available methods, including direct bank transfer, credit or debit card, as well as supported cryptocurrencies. We’ve added the ‘Pull to Refresh’ to reflect instant balance and transactions updates, and other improvements and bugfixes to enhance the overall app experience.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

The Uphold app allows you to add and withdraw funds directly from your iOS device using all the available methods, including direct bank transfer, credit or debit card, as well as supported cryptocurrencies. We’ve added the ‘Pull to Refresh’ to reflect instant balance and transactions updates, and other improvements and bugfixes to enhance the overall app experience.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

The new version of Uphold app for iOS features a newly designed card screen, as well as the capability for bitcoin payments through QR Codes.
As always, other small improvements and bugfixes were made to enhance the overall app experience.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

The new version of Uphold app for iOS features a newly designed card screen, as well as the capability for bitcoin payments through QR Codes.
As always, other small improvements and bugfixes were made to enhance the overall app experience.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

The new version of Uphold app introduces the BCH card.
As always, other small improvements and bugfixes were made to enhance the overall app experience.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

The new version of Uphold app introduces the BAT card.
As always, other small improvements and bugfixes were made to enhance the overall app experience.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

The new version of Uphold app introduces the BAT card.
As always, other small improvements and bugfixes were made to enhance the overall app experience.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

The new version of Uphold app introduces the Wire Transfers option and it’s now possible to buy, convert, hold and send BCH directly from your Uphold Wallet.
As always, other small improvements and bugfixes were made to enhance the overall app experience.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

This new version introduces support to "Add a bank account" directly from your Uphold Wallet and enhancements to the security, namely the Passcode / TouchID.
As always, other small improvements and bugfixes were made to enhance the overall experience.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a review.

XRP (#3 highest market cap in crypto coins) now available to buy, sell and hold in the Uphold wallet. We have made several security and usability improvements too.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

This new version introduces support to "Add a bank account" directly from your Uphold Wallet and enhancements to the security, namely the Passcode / TouchID.
As always, other small improvements and bugfixes were made to enhance the overall experience.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a review.

Dash (#6 highest market cap in crypto coins) now available to buy, sell and hold in the Uphold wallet. We have several security and usability improvements too.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

Bitcoin Gold (#10 highest market cap in crypto coins) now available to buy, sell and hold in the Uphold wallet. We have made several security and usability improvements too.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

Credit Card Funding now available. Link and send money to your Uphold wallet from Credit and Debit cards Instantly. We've also made some security improvements.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

Dash InstantSend now available. This improves transaction times when sending funds to the Dash Network.
We also made some security improvements and minor bug fixes.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

We also made some security improvements and minor bug fixes.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

XRP (#3 highest market cap in crypto coins) now available to buy, sell and hold in the Uphold wallet. We have made several security and usability improvements too.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

- New feature: "Use all available funds" is now available in your uphold mobile wallet.
- We made some security improvements.
- And we made some tweaks to make our app easier to use.

Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

We now support full XRP wallet functionality. You can send and receive XRP to and from any wallet in the XRP network. As always, other small improvements and bugfixes were made to enhance the overall app experience.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

We now support full XRP wallet functionality. You can send and receive XRP to and from any wallet in the XRP network. As always, other small improvements and bugfixes were made to enhance the overall app experience.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

We now support full XRP wallet functionality. You can send and receive XRP to and from any wallet in the XRP network. As always, other small improvements and bugfixes were made to enhance the overall app experience.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

We now support full XRP wallet functionality. You can send and receive XRP to and from any wallet in the XRP network. As always, other small improvements and bugfixes were made to enhance the overall app experience.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

Uphold is among the first to make LBA readily available. You can buy, hold and sell LBA in the Uphold wallet. As always, other small improvements and bugfixes were made to enhance the overall app experience.
Please share any feedback or suggestions to hello@uphold.com or leave a rating review.

With a sleeker look and feel, our new app allows you to find information quickly and make transactions seamlessly.
The app brings you powerful new features, such as Portfolio View and real-time market price history.
Total balances gives you a convenient way to check your portfolio. Opening an asset, now displays detailed ticker pricing, which can help you study specific periods. Cards and transaction activity are now organized under assets.
The old stuff you love is still there. You’ll find the “cards” and original functionalities simply easier to use and more “transactional”.
You can buy, sell, deposit, withdraw and send funds to other members as before.
Key Benefits:
- Easy-to-access transaction menu with clearly labeled choices.
- Transact seamlessly, with data such as market price and limits shown upfront.
- Overview of portfolio and market activity.
- Detailed ticker pricing across assets.
- Better organized assets and trading tools.
- Track all past and pending transactions.
- Filters to find essential data fast so you can make better decisions, including ticker timeframes and past transaction types.
- Tooltips and linked tutorials help you learn more quickly.
- New app-specific passcode options include FaceID and fingerprint for greater security.
- Two-factor authentication protects your account log in and withdrawals.

What's new:
- New 2-step verification method available! You can now protect your account using your preferred application, e.g., Google Authenticator, Authy, 1Password and more.
​
Security:
- Portfolio screen not being shown anymore before PIN, TouchID or FaceID.
​
Enhancements:
- Improved handling when scanning a crypto address QR code.
- Improved handling when copying a crypto address to the clipboard.
- Better Chart UI and main menu.
- Better success and error messages.

- Explore and add apps from the list of Uphold's partnerships to bring more functionality to your Uphold account.

What's new:

What's new:
- Our charts just got better: now you can see the price of assets on specific dates.
- Quick QR codes: now it's easy for your friends and family to pay you. You can share your deposit address by tapping the QR code icon in any asset.
- Better bank connectivity with Plaid: get higher limits and faster settlement times.

- Quick QR codes: now it's easy for your friends and family to pay you. You can share your deposit address by tapping the QR code icon in any asset.
- Better bank connectivity with Plaid: get higher limits and faster settlement times.
Trading with Uphold just got simpler and easier! We've refined the trading experience on the mobile app. Give it a try!

Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Our new app introduces a wide range of enhancements including:

- 0% trading commissions
- 0% debit & credit card deposit fees
- 0% withdrawal fees
- 'Anything-to Anything' trading UX
- Bank connectivity and local currency support in the UK, Canada, Czech Republic, Poland, Hungary, Romania and Croatia.
Bug fix and improvements.
Say hello to notifications: you can now receive personalized updates, tips and offers on your device.
Bug fix and performance improvements.
Added support to withdraw funds to bank accounts for the following currencies: GBP, CAD, PLN, CZK, HRK, HUF, RON.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
‘Anything to Anything’ it’s now much easier. We’ve simplified how you search and navigate through assets and your contacts.
‘Anything to Anything’ it’s now much easier. We’ve simplified how you search and navigate through assets and your contacts.
It’s now easier for you to manage your portfolio. We’ve improved our graphs for you to better understand the trends.
Got a new phone and lost your 2-step configuration? No worries, you can now update it on your Uphold app.
Never miss a chance, again! Now you can follow your favorite markets and we'll let you know when there's a big price change.

Coil creators can now choose Uphold as their wallet provider utilizing the Interledger Protocol.

Uphold now supports automated trading, with repeat and scheduled transactions!
Whether it's sending gold to family each month, paying your rent, or making a recurring buy order for a favorite stock, you now can set and forget transactions by scheduling payments in advance.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Introducing Universal Gold (UPXAU), a physical-gold backed token that’s free to hold, government backed and spendable on a debit card.

You asked, we listened! Chainlink (LINK) and 0x (ZRX) are now a fully-integrated Tier 3 currency, which means you can deposit and withdraw to external wallets, as well as buy, hold, and send on the platform. We’re also excited to announce full blockchain integration for Orchid (OTX).

We're introducing 'dark mode' as an alternative aesthetic display to the default light mode. Try it out and you can always switch back.
We've also taken care of some technical bug fixes which should result in a smoother experience when using the app.

New Global ID integration! Take advantage of your Global ID account’s ‘single sign on’ feature for a faster way to log in to Uphold.

Limit orders has landed! Buy and sell any asset at your desired target price.
A traditional limit order is an order to buy or sell an asset at a specific price or better but requires users to lock in or freeze their funds at the time an order is placed until filled or cancelled. Uphold’s smart limit orders allow users to place up to 50 limit orders simultaneously without having to lock in funds at the time the limit order is set up.
